energylabels.title: Energy Labels
energylabels.description: The AURORA project has designed a set of labels, which give citizens a clear understanding of their current energy profile. A separate set of labels is assigned for Energy Consumption and Carbon Emissions.

main.title: Energy Tracker: Dashboard
main.description: AURORA is an ongoing citizen science project and the data on this page is provided without guarantee.

error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

auth.legal: This tool was developed by the AURORA Horizon 2020 EU-funded project (No. <projectNumber>101036418</projectNumber>). Your data is processed by members of the project consortium and securely stored in Google Firebase. Your data will only be used for research purposes in an anonymised format and never commercially without your explicit consent. You can modify, download or delete your data at any time or reach out to our support under <supportEmail>app-support@aurora-h2020.eu</supportEmail>. By proceeding you agree to AURORA's <termsOfService>Terms of Service</termsOfService> and <privacyPolicy>Privacy Policy</privacyPolicy>.

profile.selectCountryDescription: This information helps us to more accurately calculate your carbon footprint. Please note that you can't change your country later. Crowdfunding of local photovoltaic installations is currently only planned for select cities of AURORA project partners.
profile.marketingConsentDescription: I would like to receive updates about the app and AURORA project by email.

pvInvestment.automaticGenerationDisclaimer: This entry was created by your PV investment. It will update automatically with the latest data.
pvInvestment.editInvestmentDisclaimer: If you have made additional investments at a later date, please add a new investment instead. Editing your existing investments may result in inaccurate tracking.
pvInvestment.addInvestmentDisclaimer: Entering your investment data is exclussively for recording purposes. This does not formulate an actual investment or binding order in any form.

pvInvestment.investmentDescription: The amount of money you invested
pvInvestment.shareDescription: How much of the solar panel installation's capacity your investment corresponds to. You should find this information in the documents you received when you made your investment.

deleteInvestmentDialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete this investment?
deleteInvestmentDialog.body: Deleting an investment does not automatically remove the associated consumption entry from your profile, but prevents existing entries to be updated.

pvInvestment.investmentDateDescription: The day you made the investment on.

labelGuide.title: How does it work?
labelGuide.description: Your energy labels are calculated based on your tracked consumption and specific to your location. This means, as you enter data throughout the year, more of your carbon emission and energy budgets will be made available. For example: If you have only entered data for all days of January and December, 2/12 of the total budget will be used to calculate your label. The only exception is transportation, which yields the full budget after a certain number of annual entries. Your overall budget is based on the sum of your electricity, heating and transportation budgets.

downloadMyData.description: Downloads a JSON file with all data stored in your account.

downloadConsumptions.description: Downloads a CSV file with all your consumptions.

deletePopup.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deletePopup.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
deletePopup.confirmationDisclaimer: Yes, I want to delete my account and understand that it is lost forever.

rejectConsentDeletePopup.title: Warning!
rejectConsentDeletePopup.description: Rejecting the latest Privacy Policy and Terms of Services requires us to delete your account. Note that we cannot recover your account after deleting it.

legal.updatedLegalDocuments: We have updated our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service. Please review and accept the latest version to continue using the app.

summary.noDataAvailable: Add consumptions to see your summary

confirmUnitSystem.description: You do not have a unit system set and are currently using the metric system.

featureGuide.body: Your investment in your local AURORA solar power installations helps reduce your carbon footprint. Here you can see a breakdown of the total energy produced by the installation (Total Production) and your investment's contribution (Your Production). Your contribution is automatically added as an offset to your profile each Friday morning to help you reach near-zero emissions.
featureGuide.title: How does it work?

pv.showProductionSinceFirstInvestment: Show production since your first investment.
pv.multipleInvestmentsDisclaimer: Adding multiple investments is only necessary if you later buy additional shares.
